cells.source:
### Overview

Analyze data and hypothesis
Planning and Experimental Design
Sample Size estimation


Significant Test and Power Analysis
Count Data

Proportion

N = 10000
trial1 = 10000
success1 = 500
trial2 = 10000
success2 = 550
prior.trial = 1
prior.success = 1



x <- rbeta(N, success1 + prior.success, trial1 - success1 + prior.trial)
y <- rbeta(N, success2 + prior.success, trial2 - success2 + prior.trial)
quantile(x, c(.025, .975))
quantile(y, c(.025, .975))

qbeta(c(.025, .975), success1 + prior.success, trial1 - success1 + prior.trial)
qbeta(c(.025, .975), success2 + prior.success, trial2 - success2 + prior.trial)




options(repr.plot.width=4, repr.plot.height=3)

cat("A in red, B in green")
hist(x, xlim=c(.07, .3), ylim=c(0, 700), freq=T, breaks=100, col="red", main="a", xlab=NULL, ylab=NULL)  # A in red
par(new=T)
hist(y, xlim=c(.07, .3), ylim=c(0, 700), freq=T, breaks=100, col="green", main="     b", xlab=NULL, ylab=NULL) # B in green

cat("rough power")
sum(y > quantile(x, .975)) / N   # rough power
sum(y > qbeta(.975, success1+1, trial1-success1+1)) /N

boxplot(cbind(x, y), horizontal=T)

prior.c = 2
prior.n = 1

c1 = 20
n1 = 1
c2 = 25
n2 = 1


a <- rgamma(N, c1 + prior.c, n1 + prior.n)
b <- rgamma(N, c2 + prior.c, n2 + prior.n)

cat("A in red, B in green")

hist(a, xlim=c(5, 40), ylim=c(0, 400), freq=T, breaks=100, col="red", main="a", xlab=NULL, ylab=NULL)   # A in red
par(new=T)
hist(b, xlim=c(5, 40), ylim=c(0, 400), freq=T, breaks=100, col="green", main="     b", xlab=NULL, ylab=NULL) # B in green

quantile(a, c(.025, .975))
quantile(b, c(.025, .975))

qgamma(c(.025, .975), c1 + prior.c, n1 + prior.n)
qgamma(c(.025, .975), c2 + prior.c, n2 + prior.n)

cat("rough power")
sum(b > quantile(a, .975))/N  # rough power
sum(b > qgamma(.975, c1 + prior.c, n1 + prior.n)) /N

boxplot(cbind(a, b), horizontal=T)
